name: CTIS2024_516402_32_00_Primary_Outcome_1
title: CTIS2024-516402-32-00 Primary Outcome 1
citeAs: CTIS2024-516402-32-00 Primary Outcome 1 [Database Entry: FHIR EvidenceVariable Resource]. Contributors: Brian S. Alper, MD, MSPH [Authors/Creators]. In: Fast Evidence Interoperability Resources (FEvIR) Platform, FOI 346487. Revised 2026-01-26. Available at: https://fevir.net/resources/EvidenceVariable/346487. Computable resource at: https://fevir.net/resources/EvidenceVariable/346487#json.
description: Response to therapy, defined by the absence of any of the following events: i) at 6-month follow-up: persistent renal replacement therapy, eGFR<15ml/mn/1,73m2, or patient death; ii) at W2 : persistent hemolysis despite well conducted antihypertensive therapy. Any Eculizumab rescue in the control group will be considered as a failure.
